name: Gentle Female Boss 温柔女上司
name_original: Gentle Female Boss 温柔女上司
description:
Game Story
This is a love theme of AVG Games, you are playing the lead role is the internship work of college students, originally you thought it was just the most common work internship experience, until you met your female boss Lingjie, she is always so gentle. You always have endless words, you also often help her children make-up classes, each make-up classes end Ling Jie will give you some sweet reward. As the relationship heats up, you start to have more ideas...

Game Elements
*30,000 words of rich story
*English and Chinese subtitles
*The heroine dubs in Chinese
*Total CG 10, including more than 40 difference changes
*Sexy CG7, and are dynamic CG
